articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Construction Site of Power Station
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Construction Site of Power Station
Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the construction site of the Kumyagang Army-People Power Station nearing completion.
					 He was accompanied by Kwak Pom Gi, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and department director of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and Hong Sok Hyong and Thae Jong Su, department directors of the C.C., the WPK, and Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, department directors of the NDC. 
					
					 The appearance of a vast man-made lake as a result of the building of a gigantic dam in the upper reaches of the River Kumya made it possible not only to produce a large volume of electricity but to sufficiently water a large area of farmland and protect the Kumya Plain from flood damage. 
					
					 After being briefed on the construction of the power station before a huge map showing its panoramic view, he went round various places of the power station nearing completion to learn in detail about the progress made in the project.
					
					  The soldiers and civilian builders have successfully completed the construction of a large-scale power station, a huge nature-transforming project, on their own by working hard under difficult conditions, he said, adding that this astonishing miracle amounts to a striking demonstration of the might of the unbreakable unity between the army and people in the DPRK who have formed a harmonious whole with the Party and the leader and the tremendous potential of the independent national economy and one more great victory won by the Korean people in the struggle to courageously frustrate the imperialists' moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK and glorify Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses.
					
					 Looking at paintings and works done by the soldier-builders and members of a shock brigade, he heard a lot of stories about the beautiful traits displayed among them in the course of construction.
					
					 Noting that a lot of monumental structures are now under construction in different parts of the country to go down long in history along with the era of Songun thanks to the devoted struggle of soldiers and people, he stressed that this eye-opening change represents the great dynamism of the country dashing ahead like the wind towards the peak of a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 He set forth tasks to be fulfilled to wind up the construction of the power station earlier than scheduled, pointing out that the power station is of great importance in realizing the nation's electrification. 
					
					 In order to finish as quickly as possible the construction of the power station progressing at the final phase it is necessary for such relevant units as the Taean Heavy Machine Complex to preferentially supply in good time custom-built equipment needed for the construction, he said.
					
					 It is quite possible to complete the remaining project as scheduled to honor the promise made to the Party if the builders push forward the construction in the "Huichon Speed," a new Chollima speed, he said, underscoring the need to continue displaying the revolutionary soldier spirit, the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance as required by the era of a great revolutionary surge.
					
					 He had a photo session with the builders of the power station.

articles.title: Gift from DRC
articles.content:
Gift from DRC
Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the family of Joseph Kasavubu, first president of Democratic Congo.
					 The gift was handed over to the DPRK ambassador to Democratic Congo on July 28.

articles.title: Sino-DPRK Friendly Visiting Group Here
articles.content:
Sino-DPRK Friendly Visiting Group Here
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- A Sino-DPRK friendly visiting group led by Xin Qi, vice-president of the China Association for International Friendly Contact, arrived here on Wednesday on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the entry of the Chinese People's Volunteers into the Korean front.

articles.title: World Breastfeeding Week Observed
articles.content:
World Breastfeeding Week Observed
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- An event took place in Hamhung, South Hamgyong Province, on Wednesday on the occasion of the World Breastfeeding Week. 
					 Present there were officials concerned, public health workers in various provinces and cities and staff members of the missions of the UNICEF and the WHO here.
					
					 An inaugural speech was followed by speeches of the representative of the UNICEF and an official of the WHO here.
					
					 Speakers said that the UNICEF set the first week of August every year as the World Breastfeeding Week and recommended all the countries to conduct activities on this week.
					
					 They underscored the need to successfully conduct the work to promote the health of the mothers and babies on the occasion of the week. 
					
					 The participants heard speeches before looking round photos displayed on the occasion of the week.

articles.title: Pyongyang Silk Shop
articles.content:
Pyongyang Silk Shop
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Silk Shop was recently opened in Mansudae Street.
					 The shop sells some kinds of clothes including national clothes, quilts, pillows, various decorations suitable for national clothes and other ornaments, all made of silk from the Pakchon and Nyongbyon silk mills in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 Most popular among the silk goods is chima and jogori (Korean skirt and jacket) made of Yaksan silk.
					
					 Customers can also have clothes made at the shop with silk cloth they choose.
					
					 Laundry soup for silk goods is also on sale at the shop.
					
					 Ko Ryon Hui, manager of the shop, told KCNA the demand for silk goods was ever increasing among citizens.

articles.title: Great Program for Independent Reunification
articles.content:
Great Program for Independent Reunification
Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- August 4 is the 13th anniversary of the publication of "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification", a famous work of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 When the work was made public, the cause of Korean reunification was faced with trials. 
					
					 After President Kim Il Sung passed away on July 8, Juche 83 (1994), the inter-Korean relations got worse and military tension became more acute on the Korean peninsula due to the treacherous acts of the "civilian-veiled" fascist clique of south Korea. 
					
					 All the Korean people desirous of the country's reunification were troubled about the situation of the peninsula.   
					
					 At that juncture, Kim Jong Il published the afore-mentioned work giving comprehensive and scientific answers to questions arising in putting an end to national division and reunifying the country.
					
					 In the work he formulated as the three charters for national reunification the three principles of national reunification, ten-point programme for the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo laid down by the President. 
					
					 He also gave detailed tasks and ways for reunifying the country -- solving the reunification issue on the principle of national independence, achieving great unity with priority given to common interests of the nation, realizing the country's reunification in a peaceful way, establishing a united national state through federation and improving north-south relations. 
					
					 Over the past 13 years, the work has displayed a great power in the effort to reunify the country on the principle of national independence and great unity.
					
					 The June 15 north-south joint declaration, which is a milestone for the country's reunification in the new century, and the October 4 declaration, which is a program for its implementation, were adopted and a new era of achieving reunification by the efforts of the Korean nation has been opened up.
					
					 The Korean people's efforts for achieving the country's reunification are still faced with grave challenges of anti-reunification forces at home and abroad. But the desire of the Korean nation for the reunification will surely be realized on the basis of the two declarations reflecting the three charters.

articles.title: Projects for "Improvement of Four Large Rivers" Censured
articles.content:
Projects for "Improvement of Four Large Rivers" Censured
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the Federation of Peasants Associations of south Korea made public a statement on July 30 in denunciation of the puppet group's unpopular projects for the "improvement of four large rivers".
					 The statement referred to the fact that members of the environment movement organization have been on a sit-in strike in the construction sites in Ryoju, Kyonggi Province, and Haman, South Kyongsang Province, in protest against the authorities pushing ahead with the projects.
					
					 The statement denounced the Lee Myung Bak regime for taking such repressive actions as threatening the participants in the strike with government power and contemplating even legal actions against them.
					
					 Charging that the above-said projects represent an unpopular policy for degrading the ecological environment of nature, violating the right of the peasants to existence and bringing the agriculture on this land to ruin, the statement expressed positive support to the members of the environment movement organization in their just actions against those projects.
					
					 The statement said the peasants in all areas would wage a more dynamic struggle against the projects, adding that the organization would conduct a 300 000-strong signature campaign as its immediate task.

articles.title: Collusion and Tie-up between US-Japan under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Collusion and Tie-up between US-Japan under Fire in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- At least 80 south Korean progressive organizations including the Council for the Peaceful Reunification of Tangun's Nation, the Federation of Homogeneous Nation Movement Organizations and the Council of Bereaved Families of Men of Merit for Independence held a meeting for making history of national sovereignty in Seoul on July 29 on the lapse of 105 years since the fabrication of the "Taft-Katsura Agreement," a product of the criminal collusion and tie-up between the U.S. and Japanese aggressors. 
					 Speakers at the meeting said that its purpose was to clearly probe the truth behind the criminal collusion and tie-up between the U.S. and Japanese aggressors and demonstrate the strong will of the Koreans not to allow themselves again to be insulted and cajoled by foreign forces. 
					
					 Noting that it is possible to completely heal the wounds caused by the disgrace and sufferings in those days only when the Korean nation achieves true peace and reunification on the Korean Peninsula, they called on the Koreans in the north and the south and overseas to unite under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration. 
					
					 A declaration read out at the meeting held that the above-said agreement historically proves how craftily the U.S. and Japanese aggressors worked to deprive the Koreans of national sovereignty, guided by the law of the jungle. 
					
					 It declared that the period from July 29 to November 17 would be fixed as the period of the movement for making a history of national sovereignty during which a dynamic struggle would be staged against the U.S., Japan and war. 
					
					 It called on the people of all strata to launch a dynamic struggle to achieve cooperation among Koreans, remove the danger of war from the Korean Peninsula and realize their desire for peaceful reunification under the banner of the above-said declarations.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Joint Military Maneuvers Lambasted in Austria
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Joint Military Maneuvers Lambasted in Austria
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation sent letters to the embassies of the United States and the south Korean puppet authorities in Vienna on July 27 in protest against their war maneuvers. 
					 The letters demanded the U.S. and the south Korean authorities immediately halt all forms of war maneuvers against the DPRK.
					
					 Noting that the joint military exercises were prompted by the U.S. imperialists' aggressive design to put the whole of Korea under their control, the letters urged the present U.S. administration to stop all kinds of provocations such as military exercises as it does not hesitate to launch even a war for meeting its purpose.
					
					 They demanded the south Korean authorities stop the war actions against the DPRK at once and do not toe the U.S. line but behave in the spirit of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.

articles.title: Anniversary of Victory in War Observed in Britain and India
articles.content:
Anniversary of Victory in War Observed in Britain and India
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on July 27, the 57th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The statement noted that the Korean people could overcome the trials of the fierce war and inflict a crushing defeat upon the U.S. imperialists and their lackeys and achieve the historic victory as they bravely fought with one will and purpose under the correct leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea and the government of DPRK.
					
					 The victory in the Fatherland Liberation War was attributable to the Juche-oriented military tactics and the Songun idea of President Kim Il Sung, it stressed.
					
					 The statement warned that if the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces provoke another Korean war, they will sustain a defeat thousand times heavier than that they did in the 1950s from the Korean people.
					
					 Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, said in a statement on the same day that the victory won by the Korean people in the three-year war takes a prominent position in the history of the DPRK, adding that the Korean people are the heroic people who inflicted a disastrous defeat on the U.S. for the first time in history.
					
					 Harising Khang, member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist), stressed in his statement on the same day that the great victory won by the WPK and the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War is the victory with which they shattered the myth of the United States' "mightiness" to defend the freedom and independence of the country and gave confidence to the peoples of all countries suffering from the imperialist tyranny.

articles.title: Korean People's Day of Victory in War Marked in Peru
articles.content:
Korean People's Day of Victory in War Marked in Peru 
Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism issued a bulletin on July 23 on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 The bulletin carried a photograph of President Kim Il Sung addressing a mass rally held in Pyongyang to celebrate the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and another photograph of him among servicepersons of the Korean People's Army together with articles titled "Comrade Kim Il Sung who made undying contribution to the cause of global independence" and "The invincible and iron-willed commander."
					
					 The bulletin said in the articles that Kim Il Sung was not only the father of socialist Korea but a great pioneer of the era of independence. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The President founded the undying Juche idea and applied it to all fields of the revolution and construction and gave perfect answers to the theoretical and practical issues arising in the struggle for making the whole world independent.
					
					 He steered the anti-Japanese armed struggle and the Fatherland Liberation War to victory, setting an example in the national liberation struggle in colonies and the struggle to protect the sovereignty of the country and nation. He turned the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence and sincerely helped peoples of developing countries in their drive for building a new society. 
					
					 The bulletin stressed that Kim Il Sung clearly indicated the way of developing the non-aligned movement and reviving socialism.

articles.title: Korean People's Day of Victory in War Celebrated
articles.content:
Korean People's Day of Victory in War Celebrated
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- A lecture was held in Tanzania, a joint meeting of political parties and organizations in India and a meeting, a seminar and film shows in Nigeria and Pakistan between July 24 and 27 to celebrate the 57th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The chairman of the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups said in a lecture that in Korea the United States suffered a crushing defeat for the first time in its history by President Kim Il Sung's distinguished commanding art. 
					
					 Speakers at the meeting in India said that July 27, 1953, is the day of victory when the DPRK defeated the U.S. imperialists and their allied forces in the three-year hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War thanks to the Juche-oriented military idea, strategy, matchless pluck and extraordinary commanding art of the President. 
					
					They stressed that the Korean people are now bolstering up the nuclear deterrent to cope with the escalating nuclear threat of the U.S. imperialists and reliably defending the fortress of socialism under the Songun politics of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Ahmed Blaza Lawan, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics, in his speech at a meeting expressed full support and solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle to smash the obstructive moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers and open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012.
					
					 Javed Ansari, secretary general of the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan, stressed in his speech that the DPRK has the invincible army whose members have grown to be a-match-for-a-hundred combatants under the care of Kim Jong Il and strength of the unbreakable unity in one mind of the leader, the party and the masses and that its defence capability is tremendous. 
					
					 Appreciated at the film shows were such Korean films as "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation."
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar in Pakistan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il visita la exposicion de articulos de consumo popular
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il visita la exposicion de articulos de consumo popular
Pyongyang, 4 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, visito la exposicion de articulos de consumo popular de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur. 
					En esta exposicion inaugurada con motivo del 26o aniversario de la presentacion de la orientacion del PTC de producir los "articulos de consumo popular 3 de Agosto" se veian mas de 40 mil articulos de 493 variedades producidos por las fabricas de industria central y local en la provincia y por los equipos de amas de casa organizados en las unidades de vecinos.
					
					Examinando varios articulos de consumo popular como vestidos, zapatos, alimentos, utensilios domesticos, utilidades de cocina, articulos escolares y de uso cultural, articulos miscelaneos de uso diario, etc., el Dirigente hizo conocimiento detallado de la produccion de "articulos de consumo popular 3 de Agosto".
					
					Los articulos utiles producidos en las fabricas, empresas y equipos de amas de casa de la provincia con las materias residuales y desechos son bien acogidos por los compradores y hacen gran aporte a la vida del pueblo, senalo el Dirigente.
					
					Prosiguio que las experiencias del pasado muestran elocuentemente que si los funcionarios trabajan con asiduo, pueden contribuir activamente a la mejora de la vida del pueblo al producir muchos articulos de industria ligera necesarios con pocos fondos. 
					
					Ahora en las provincias, las ciudades, los distritos, las fabricas y las empresas se incrementan constantemente los talleres y brigadas de produccion de articulos de primera necesidad, los equipos de amas de casa, los equipos de produccion suplementaria y las amas de casa que se dedican a los servicios publicos y se aumentan las variedades de articulos de consumo popular que contribuyen mucho a la vida del pueblo, dijo y recalco que esta realidad comprueba claramente la justeza y la vitalidad de la orientacion de nuestro partido de desarrollar la produccion de "articulos de consumo popular 3 de Agosto" como movimiento masivo. 
					
					Finalizado el recorrido, el Dirigente presento en el mismo lugar las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en dinamizar la produccion de "articulos de consumo popular 3 de Agosto".
					
					Apunto que el centro, las provincias, las ciudades y los distritos deben tener presente la importancia y el significado del movimiento por la produccion de "articulos de consumo popular 3 de Agosto" y desarrollarlo sin treguas.
					
					A medida que se hace comoda la vida del pueblo y se eleva su nivel cultural, crecen sus demandas sobre las mercancias de buena calidad, apunto y enfatizo que deben poner en pleno funcionamiento las fabricas de industria ligera en el centro y localidades.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, todas las unidades deben poner de pleno manifiesto la responsabilidad y la creatividad de los productores y prestar atencion primordial al mejoramiento decisivo de la calidad de los "articulos de consumo popular 3 de Agosto", destaco.
					
					Registrar este ano del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del partido un cambio trascendental en la vida del pueblo es la firme decision y voluntad del partido, afirmo y llamo encarecidamente a todas las unidades de produccion de articulos de consumo popular a levantar un gran salto para acoger dignamente el gran festival de octubre (mes de fundacion del partido) dedicando los exitos laborales hechos con fidelidad.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, Kwak Pom Gi, el vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, y los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, Hong Sok Hyong y Thae Jong Su.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente de familia de Kasavubu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente de familia de Kasavubu
Pyongyang, 4 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio presente que le dedicara la familia del primer presidente del Congo Democratico, Kasavubu.
					El regalo fue entregado el 28 de julio al embajador coreano en ese pais africano.

articles.title: Actividad por semana mundial de lactacion con la leche de madre
articles.content:
Actividad por semana mundial de lactacion con la leche de madre
						
Pyongyang, 4 de agosto (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 4 en Hamhung de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur la actividad por la semana mundial de lactacion con la leche de madre.
					En la ocasion participaron los funcionarios correspondientes, los trabajadores de salud publica de varias provincias y ciudades y los miembros de las oficinas del Fondo de las Naciones Unidas para la Infancia (UNICEF) y de la Organizacion Mundial de la Salud (OMS) acreditados en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					En el acto hubo el discurso inaugural y las intervenciones del representante del UNICEF y un oficial de la OMS en Corea.
					
					Los oradores apuntaron que el UNICEF definio la primera semana de agosto de cada ano como semana mundial de lactacion de la madre y aconseja a todos los paises que realicen actividades dedicadas a este ciclo.
					
					Subrayaron la importancia de realizar bien los trabajos para fomentar la salud de la madre y los ninos a traves de ese ciclo.
					
					Luego de escuchar las intervenciones, los participantes vieron las fotos exhibidas con el mismo motivo.

articles.title: Entidad austriaca protesta a EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Entidad austriaca protesta a EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 4 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Bloque Izquierdista de la Federacion de los Sindicatos de Austria envio el 27 de julio una carta a las embajadas de Estados Unidos y de los titeres surcoreanos en ese pais para protestar las maniobras de guerra de ellos.
					  La carta demanda a EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas parar ahora mismo todos los ejercicios de guerra contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Precisa que el ejercicio militar conjunto EE.UU.- Sur de Corea parte de la ambicion agresiva del imperialismo norteamericano de establecer su dominio sobre toda Corea y exige a la actual administracion norteamericana, que no repara en desatar la guerra para cumplir sus metas, el cese de los ejercicios militares y otras formas de provocacion.
					
					  Subraya que las autoridades surcoreanas tienen que cesar ahora mismo los actos belicos contra la RPDC y adoptar el espiritu de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio, en lugar de obedecer a EE.UU.

articles.title: Alaban en el extranjero el triunfo del pueblo coreano en guerra
articles.content:
Alaban en el extranjero el triunfo del pueblo coreano en guerra 
Pyongyang, 4 de agosto (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 57o aniversario del triunfo del pueblo coreano en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, la Asociacion de Estudio de la Politica de Songun y el Grupo de Estudio de la Idea Juche, de Gran Bretana, publicaron el 27 de julio una declaracion conjunta.
					Bajo la correcta direccion del partido y el gobierno, el pueblo coreano lucho con la unica voluntad y coraje y logro de esta manera la historica victoria superando las duras dificultades de la guerra y haciendo sufrir una gran derrota al imperialismo yanqui y sus lacayos, apunta la nota.
					
					Destaca que esta victoria se debe enteramente a los autoctonos metodos de combate y la idea del Songun del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					Concluye advirtiendo al imperialismo norteamericano y los titeres surcoreanos que el pueblo coreano les infligira la derrota mil veces mas tragica que la sufrida en la decada de 1950, si se atreven a desatar la segunda guerra coreana.
					
					El director general del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche, Vishwanath, en su declaracion publicada el mismo dia, subrayo que el triunfo del pueblo coreano en la trienal guerra fue registrado en letras mayusculas en la historia de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y agrego que el pueblo coreano es el heroico que derroto a Estados Unidos por primera vez en la historia.
					
					Por otra parte, el miembro del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de la India (Marxista), Harising Khang, publico tambien su declaracion el 27 de julio enfatizando que la gran victoria lograda por el Partido del Trabajo y el pueblo de Corea y el pueblo coreano en la guerra coreana es el triunfo que defendio la libertad y la independencia del pais rompiendo el mito de la "supremacia" de EE.UU. e inspiro la fe en los pueblos de todos los paises oprimidos por el imperialismo.
